item.title: ‘Outlander: Blood of My Blood’ Team Breaks Down Prequel’s Most Heart-Wrenching Episode Yet
item.description: Showrunner Matthew B. Roberts and stars Hermione Corfield, Jeremy Irvine talk about Claire’s parents, and the harrowing hour for mother Julia Moriston: “I actually [couldn’t] get up.”

item.title: ‘Outlander: Blood of My Blood’ Review: Starz Prequel Is a Richly Rendered, Delectably Romantic Treat
item.description: Years before Jamie meets Claire, his lovelorn parents defy their rival clans in 18th century Scotland while hers strike up a passionate connection through letters during World War I.
